logs.zh-cn: 调整页面布局
logs.en-us: UI Changes

logs.zh-cn: 分离“微信”单独操作
logs.en-us: Seprate 'WeChat' from others

attentions.zh-cn: 备份连接过程中手机会对手机中的数据进行计算，计算时间因手机数据多少而异，一般为数十秒到若干分钟不等（手机中微信、QQ数据文件过多也会使计算时间变长），此时请您耐心等待，您也可以通过下拉手机通知栏查看计算数据进度。
attentions.en-us: Data calculation and compression will take place while backing up your data, the more data you have, the long it will take, so please be patient while waiting, and check notification center for any progress.

attentions.zh-cn: 备份还原不支持微信记录的数据备份和还原，请使用微信内置的聊天记录迁移功能。
attentions.en-us: 'Mi Back up' DON'T support WeChat history and files, please use WeChat's built in back up utility instead.

attentions.zh-cn: 小米助手3.0二期的恢复功能暂不支持小米助手2.0的备份文件哦~
attentions.en-us: Mi PC Suite 3.0 DOSE NOT support backing up from 2.0 Backup files.

attentions.zh-cn: 极速刷机需要清除用户数据，请您刷机前备份好数据！！！
attentions.en-us: FastFlash Feature will wipe all user data, please make sure you have backed up your data.

logs.zh-cn: 我的设备：小米助手3.0二期新增加了图片、视频、文件的本地导入、导出以及删除的功能，图片添加每个模块最多不得超过500张，视频添加不得超过200。
logs.en-us: My Device: Second phase of MiAssistant 3.0 adds the feature of importing, exporting and deleting pictures, videos and files, pictures limited under 500 per module, videos limited under 200.

logs.zh-cn: 备份：小米助手3.0二期重构了备份的逻辑，无论是短信，联系人，通话记录，还是系统应用，三方应用，图片，视频，音乐，文档，都支持备份！
logs.en-us: Backup: MiAssistant 3.0 Second phase refactors the backup logic, backup SMS, contacts, call logs, system applications, third-party applications, pictures, videos, music, documents are all supported!

logs.zh-cn: 恢复：与备份一样，我们的恢复也支持整机的数据恢复功能，小米助手3.0二期的备份数据都将恢复到您的手机中，以后更换手机，刷机等情况下再也不愁手机的备份和恢复啦。
logs.en-us: Restore: As well as Backup, MiAssistant 3.0 Second phase also supports the feature of restoring the data of the entire phone, the backup data of MiAssistant 3.0 Second phase will be restored to your phone, and you will no longer worry about the backup and restore of your phone when you change your phone, flash or reinstall the system.

logs.zh-cn: 刷机：小米助手3.0二期支持Recovery刷机，我们也针对MIUI9增加了速度更快的极速刷机模式，刷机速度就像MIUI9一样“快如闪电”。
logs.en-us: Flash: MiAssistant 3.0 Second phase supports Recovery flashing, we also added the feature of fast flashing mode for MIUI9, flashing speed is like MIUI9, "fast as lightning".

attentions.zh-cn: 备份连接过程中手机会对手机中的数据进行计算，计算时间因手机数据多少而异，一般为数十秒到若干分钟不等（手机中微信、QQ数据文件过多也会使计算时间变长），此时请您耐心等待，您也可以通过下拉手机通知栏查看计算数据进度。
attentions.en-us: Data calculation and compression will take place while backing up your data, the more data you have, the long it will take, so please be patient while waiting, and check notification center for any progress.

attentions.zh-cn: 备份还原不支持微信记录的数据备份和还原，请使用微信内置的聊天记录迁移功能。
attentions.en-us: 'Mi Back up' DON'T support WeChat history and files, please use WeChat's built in back up utility instead.

attentions.zh-cn: 小米助手3.0二期的恢复功能暂不支持小米助手2.0的备份文件哦~
attentions.en-us: Mi PC Suite 3.0 DOSE NOT support backing up from 2.0 Backup files.

attentions.zh-cn: 极速刷机需要清除用户数据，请您刷机前备份好数据！！！
attentions.en-us: FastFlash Feature will wipe all user data, please make sure you have backed up your data.

logs.zh-cn: 重点解决旧版小米助手与Android 6.0以上手机不兼容的问题。
logs.en-us: Priorly solve the incompatibility between MiAssistant and Android 6.0+.

logs.zh-cn: 全新重构、全新设计的小米助手主界面，备份、恢复、刷机功能位于软件主页面上方。主页面还可以查看设备型号，MIUI版本，序列号，安卓版本，Root权限等信息。
logs.en-us: Newly designed main interface of MiAssistant, backup, restore, flash features are located at the top of the main interface. You can also check device model, MIUI version, serial number, Android version, Root permission information on the main interface.

logs.zh-cn: 备份：小米助手3.0重构了备份的逻辑，无论是短信，联系人，通话记录，还是系统应用，三方应用，图片，视频，音乐，文档，都支持备份！
logs.en-us: Backup: MiAssistant 3.0 has re-engineered the backup logic, you can backup SMS, Contacts, Call Logs, System Applications, Third-party Applications, Images, Videos, Music, Documents, etc.

logs.zh-cn: 恢复：与备份一样，我们的恢复也支持整机的数据恢复功能，小米助手3.0的备份数据都将恢复到您的手机中，以后更换手机，刷机等情况下再也不愁手机的备份和恢复啦。
logs.en-us: Restore: As well as Backup, MiAssistant 3.0 also supports the feature of restoring the data of the entire phone, the backup data of MiAssistant 3.0 Second phase will be restored to your phone, and you will no longer worry about the backup and restore of your phone when you change your phone, flash or reinstall the system.

logs.zh-cn: 刷机：小米助手3.0支持Recovery刷机，我们也针对MIUI9增加了速度更快的极速刷机模式，刷机速度就像MIUI9一样“快如闪电”。
logs.en-us: Flash: MiAssistant 3.0 supports Recovery flashing, we also added the feature of fast flashing mode for MIUI9, flashing speed is like MIUI9, "fast as lightning".

logs.en-us: Adopting pop up message for Restore notification.

logs.en-us: Fixing some known bugs.

logs.en-us: Adding Video and Audio web page functionality.

logs.en-us: Task center adds a download video prompt.

logs.en-us: Fixing the issue of third-party occupation of MDB.

logs.en-us: Check for updates function.

logs.en-us: New wallpapers function.

logs.en-us: Optimizing the connection guide UI and animation.

logs.zh-cn: 优化连接性问题
logs.en-us: Optimizing the connection issue.

logs.zh-cn: 便签支持设置提醒时间
logs.en-us: Notes now supports setting remind time.

logs.en-us: Files adding route navigation bar.

logs.zh-cn: 优化连接性问题
logs.en-us: Optimizing the connection issue.

logs.en-us: Optimizing system upgrade.

logs.zh-cn: 文件管理改版，新增专门文件分类项，并支持搜索文件
logs.en-us: Files re-designed, adding special file classification items, and supporting search files.

logs.zh-cn: 兼容性还原优化，支持选择是否恢复数据有冲突的应用
logs.en-us: Optimizing restore for campatibility, allowing you to choose whether to restore data conflicts with applications.

logs.zh-cn: 便签增加移动至便签夹功能
logs.en-us: Notes adding moving to note folder function.

logs.zh-cn: 增加支持小米Note
logs.en-us: Adding support for Xiaomi Note.

logs.zh-cn: 新增了连接向导，解决连接手机过程中各种异常情况，大幅度提高连接成功率
logs.en-us: Adding connection wizard, solving various exceptions during connection process, and greatly increasing the success rate of connection.

logs.zh-cn: 新增了便签功能，高效快捷编辑管理MIUI便签
logs.en-us: Adding Notes function, efficient and quick editing and management of MIUI notes.

logs.zh-cn: 优化了兼容性还原，增加了DCIM目录下的照片、视频还原项
logs.en-us: Optimizing compatibility for restore, adding photo and video restore items under DCIM directory.

logs.zh-cn: 适配红米2全机型
logs.en-us: Adding support for Rdmi 2 series.

logs.zh-cn: 优化连接过程设备发现逻辑和显示
logs.en-us: Optimizing throughput of connection process and display.

logs.zh-cn: 优化备份获得路径属性逻辑
logs.en-us: Optimizing backup path attribute logic.

logs.zh-cn: 优化音乐界面切换显示时不影响当前正在播放的曲目列表
logs.en-us: Optimizing music interface switching display without affecting the current playing track list.

logs.zh-cn: 优化图片预览时鼠标指针状态
logs.en-us: Optimizing mouse pointer status when previewing images.

logs.zh-cn: 优化网络短信发送提示
logs.en-us: Optimizing internet message arriving notification.

logs.zh-cn: 修复兼容性还原进度显示问题
logs.en-us: Fixing restore percentage by adopting compatibility.

logs.zh-cn: 修复备份过程获得文件属性出错导致无法继续的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing the issue causing backup stops when getting file attributes.

logs.zh-cn: 修复驱动安装失败导致无法连接的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing connection issue caused by driver installation failure.

logs.zh-cn: 修复应用管理界面显示问题
logs.en-us: Fixing the display issue of application management interface.

logs.zh-cn: 重构了还原功能，解决了系统版本不能还原备份文件的问题，这一版本将还原备份文件中的联系人、短信、应用与数据
logs.en-us: Redo of the backup function, fixing the issue that system version can't restore backup files, this version will restore contacts, SMS, applications and data in backup files.

logs.zh-cn: 重构了Fastboot刷机功能，增加了稳定版/开发版的选择，支持了红米1S电信版/联通版、红米Note 4G（其他红米机型暂不支持）
logs.en-us: Redo of the Fastboot flashing function, adding the choice of stable version/development version, supporting Redmi 1S Telecom Edition/Unicom Edition and Redmi Note 4G (other Redmi models are not supported temporarily).

logs.zh-cn: 解决了USB端口被占用问题
logs.en-us: Fixing the issue caused by USB port being occupied.

logs.zh-cn: 解决了部分手机连接性问题
logs.en-us: Fixed connectivity issue for some phones.

logs.en-us: Fixing some known bugs.

logs.en-us: Adding local music player

logs.en-us: Adding proxy setting, using system proxy settings by default

logs.zh-cn: 支持了短信双卡双待
logs.en-us: Adding support for dual SIM SMS

logs.zh-cn: 修复bug
logs.en-us: Fixing some known bugs.

logs.en-us: Adding phone ringtone section

logs.zh-cn: 搜索支持多音字比较

logs.zh-cn: 优化了应用推荐机制

logs.zh-cn: 支持新建短信时输入自动联想联系人
logs.en-us: Supporting auto-completion of contacts when creating new SMS

logs.zh-cn: 完整安装包包含驱动
logs.en-us: Full install included drivers

logs.en-us: Optimizing some UI, fixing some known bugs.

logs.zh-cn: 增加了短信管理功能，支持短信编辑发送、删除、导入、导出；
logs.en-us: Adding SMS management function, supporting SMS editing, sending, deleting, importing, and exporting;

logs.zh-cn: 增加了联系人管理功能，支持联系人编辑、新建、删除、导入、导出、分组；
logs.en-us: Adding contact management function, supporting contact editing, creation, deletion, importing, and exporting; and grouping;

logs.zh-cn: 完善了应用管理功能
logs.en-us: Compeleting application management function

logs.zh-cn: 调整了部分界面设计
logs.en-us: Redo some UI design

logs.zh-cn: 增加了音乐管理、铃声管理功能。支持手机内音乐、铃声文件的增添、导出、删除、排序、铃声设置。
logs.en-us: Adding music management and ringtone management function. Support adding, exporting, deleting, sorting, and ringtone settings for music and ringtone files stored in the phone.

logs.zh-cn: 应用管理功能增加了相关应用推荐，优化了界面
logs.en-us: Adding application recommendation to the management function, optimizing the interface

logs.zh-cn: 应用管理功能增加了搜索本地应用功能
logs.en-us: App manegement supports searching local applications

logs.zh-cn: 应用管理增加了忽略可升级应用功能
logs.en-us: Application management supports ignoring upgradeable applications

logs.zh-cn: 优化了视频管理界面
logs.en-us: Optimizing video management interface

logs.zh-cn: 增加了图片管理、视频管理框选功能
logs.en-us: Adding checkbox for photo and video management

logs.zh-cn: 增加了图片管理、视频管理右键菜单
logs.en-us: Adding right-click menu for photo and video management

logs.en-us: Fixing some known bugs.

logs.en-us: Optimizing the connection issue.

logs.zh-cn: 调整了部分界面
logs.en-us: Optimizing some UI.

logs.zh-cn: 修复了连通性bug
logs.en-us: Optimizing the connection issue.

logs.zh-cn: 小米助手2.0版本全新上线，功能进行了全面重构，界面进行重新设计
logs.en-us: MiAssistant 2.0 is released. The function is completely rebuilt, and the interface is redesigned.

logs.zh-cn: 增加了应用游戏管理、图片管理、视频管理、文件管理功能
logs.en-us: Adding management for Games, photoes, videos and files.

logs.zh-cn: 增加了演示功能（仅支持MI3 W/C 与 MI4）
logs.en-us: Adding demonstration function (Only support MI3 W/C and MI4).

logs.zh-cn: 重构了应用商店、游戏中心网页
logs.en-us: Redo the App stote and Game center web page.

logs.zh-cn: 增加了意见反馈功能
logs.en-us: Adding feedback function.

logs.zh-cn: 重构了任务中心
logs.en-us: Redo task center.

logs.zh-cn: 重构了备份还原功能
logs.en-us: Redo of backup and restore function.

logs.zh-cn: 重构了刷机功能
logs.en-us: Redo flashing function.

logs.zh-cn: 重构了版本升级策略
logs.en-us: Redo update strategy.

logs.zh-cn: 经过开发组两个月的努力，小米助手2.0 终于和大家见面了，支持小米全系列机型，肯定也支持MIUI 6啦！
logs.en-us: After two months of development, MiAssistant 2.0 is finally released, supporting all Xiaomi models, and of course, it also supports MIUI 6!

logs.zh-cn: 小米助手，前身是小米手机助手，名字中去掉了“手机”二字，因为我们现在已经支持小米平板了，未来会支持更多的小米智能设备，大家拭目以待！
logs.en-us: MiAssistat, formly as MiPhoneSuite, the name has been changed because now we support Mi Pads now, and in the future we will support more Xiaomi smart devices, so stay tuned!

logs.zh-cn: 小米助手2.0 Beta版的定位和之前完全不同。之前版本的助手是一个PC端的小工具，仅为小米用户的备份、还原、升级、刷机功能需求服务。全新改版、全新重构的小米助手，在管理功能上更加全面，更肩负起PC端分发平台的功用。
logs.en-us: MiAssistant 2.0 Beta is a different product from the previous version. The previous version of the assistant was a PC side tool for the backup, restore, upgrade, flashing functions of Xiaomi users. The newly re-designed and re-constructed MiAssistant is more comprehensive in terms of management functions, and carries the function of a PC distribution platform.

logs.zh-cn: 全新重构、全新设计的小米助手主界面，beta版的管理功能为应用游戏管理，图片管理，视频管理，文件夹管理。备份、还原、升级、刷机功能转移到了右上角~
logs.en-us: All new design and re-engineering of the main interface of Xiaomi Assistant, the beta version of management functions is Application Game Management, Image Management, Video Management, Folder Management. Backup, restore, upgrade, flashing functions are transferred to the upper right corner~

logs.zh-cn: 应用游戏管理页面，增删、导出、查看应用详情，图片管理页面 and 视频管理页面
logs.en-us: Added application Game Management Page, add, delete, export, view application details, image management page and video management page

logs.zh-cn: 全新重构的游戏中心、应用商店页面，内容比之前丰富很多，层级更清晰明确。
logs.en-us: Brand new Game center and App Store page, with more content and clearer hierarchy than before.

logs.zh-cn: 米3的用户们请注意啦，小米助手有新的玩法。点击红圈内的“演示”button，可以手机、PC实时投射演示， 更可以鼠标键盘逆向操作手机！新的玩法等你尝试！投射演示窗口，可以全屏，一切手机的操作都可以在PC上完成~（暂只支持米3W/C、米4）
logs.en-us: Attention to the Mi3 users, Xiaomi Assistant has a new play. Click the "Demo" button inside the red circle, you can project the demonstration on the phone and PC in real time, and you can also reverse the operation of the mouse and keyboard on the phone! New play waiting for you to try! Projection demonstration window, you can full screen, all mobile phone operations can be completed on the PC~ (only supports Mi3W / C, Mi4)

logs.zh-cn: 使用过程中出现任何问题，点击主界面左下角的“意见反馈”，按照提示把你的log文件提交在帖子中，开发组会及时回复解答你的问题。
logs.en-us: If you encounter any problems during usage, click the "Feedback" button at the lower left corner of the main interface, submit your log file in the post according to the prompt, and the development group will reply to your questions in time.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 fastboot刷机模式红米识别错误的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing the issue of mismathcing redmi devices in fastboot mode

logs.zh-cn: 修复 错误的文件权限导致备份失败的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing the issue causing backup stops when getting file attributes.

logs.en-us: Fixing the issue showing errors while logging in the cloud service.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 上传到云相册时文件名后缀解析出错的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing the issue of extension names being parsed incorrectly when uploading files to the cloud album.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 安装路径出现符号连接导致安装和升级失败的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing the issue of installation and upgrade failure caused by symbolic links in the installation path.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 还原时找不到备份记录的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing backup record missing while restore.

logs.zh-cn: 新增 支持红米Note
logs.en-us: Adding support for Redmi Note.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 MDB机型兼容问题
logs.en-us: Fixing compatibility issue for MDB models.

logs.zh-cn: 优化 更新驱动
logs.en-us: Optimizing driver update.

logs.zh-cn: 优化 支持新Fastboot压缩包格式
logs.en-us: Optimizing for new fastboot package format.

logs.zh-cn: 优化 小米手机助手的兼容性
logs.en-us: Optimizing the compatibility of MiPhoneSuite.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 网络共享导致的程序崩溃
logs.en-us: Fixing web-share casusing program crash.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 红米OTA升级异常
logs.en-us: Fixing OTA error for Redmi.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 程序崩溃
logs.en-us: Fixing Application crashes.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 红米OTA升级异常
logs.en-us: Fixing OTA error for Redmi.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 程序崩溃
logs.en-us: Fixing Application crashes.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 云服务自动同步无法取消的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing Auto-sync cannot be cancelled.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 特殊文件夹名称导致备份失败的问题
logs.en-us: Fixing special characters in folder name cause backup failure.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 程序崩溃
logs.en-us: Fixing Application crashes.

logs.zh-cn: 修复 还原某些情况下造成未备份数据丢失的问题
